revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|brand = Belkin |model = F5D8235-4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 (v20xx) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/22/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Belkin_F5D8235-4_v20xx |wlclass = N300 |series = F5D8235-4 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = K7SF5D8235-4B |icid = 3623A-F5D82354B |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3052;RT3052F, P043410B0, 0912ST; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 384 <!-- 384 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G;MX 29LV640DBTC-90G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620FTP-6;;Winbond W9812G6IH-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366RB;RMC, RTL8366RB, 93C94S1, G912B TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:22:75, 94:44:52 |oui = 00:22:75, 94:44:52
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.2;Ralink; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.2 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, J2 |jtag = no
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = boot log |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Belkin_N+_XXXXXX,Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTR-234GN |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt (Was)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/27/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 722868673799 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001CEYYFK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WRTR-234GN (WRTR-234GN_V03)
The default SSID is '''Belkin_N+_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the WLAN MAC address (upper case letters). :The device assumes the SSID of '''Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170''' for a brief moment when resetting to factory defaults. :'''Belkin_N+_Guest''' is the default SSID for the guest network, but this is not enabled by default.
The power adapter included with the device (v2110) is a '''DVE''' DSA-20P-10 US 120180 (12V, 1.5A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=21998 On the OpenWrt forums] (pic of v20xx model, console pinout, etc) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=53235 On the DD-WRT forums] (BrainSlayer's original firmware [+screenshot] included in his post on pg4) :Belkin released two v2 models.. :*v20xx, with RTL8366RB switch, working with above mentioned firmware on pg4 of the DD-WRT forum post :*v21xx, with RTL8366SR switch, [http://svn.dd-wrt.com:8000/ticket/1997 not currently working with DD-WRT (assigned on DD-WRT bug-tracker)]

==Reverting== ===Reverting dd-wrt=== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=521053#521053 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Header J2
USB port <--- [3.3V] (Tx) (Rx) (GND) --> To RT3052
Pin with the dot is the first pin, so [3.3V].
{{/Serial info}}
